item.title: xxDestructionxx - Duel Arenea - Command Bug - Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @xxifish_i_x xxifish i x
item.description:
@xxifish_i_x wrote:

ok so i added everything from emily’s TuT for the Duel arena
but the command to fight each other wont work at all…
any help here?

} if(cmd[0].equals("duel")) { if (player.getRights() <= 0) return; Player other = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)))); player.getRequests().requestDuel(other); } if(cmd[0].equals("accept")) { if (player.getRights() <= 0) return; Player other = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)))); player.getRequests().answerDuel(other);

its the exact copy of the command she had on her thread…
thanks!

Read full topic
